Getting Started with Montecarlo
===============================

Welcome to the Montecarlo project!

Prerequisites
-------------

Before you begin, ensure you have the following installed:

- Python 3.8 or later
- NumPy 1.26.3 or later
- matplotlib 3.8.2 or later

Installation
------------

Clone from GitHub:

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/MaxLinville/montecarlo
